00028 #ifndef PROGRESSREPORTER_HPP_
00029 #define PROGRESSREPORTER_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include <cassert>
00032 #include "OutputFileHandler.hpp"
00033 
00034 
00040 class ProgressReporter
00041 {
00042 private:
00044     double mStartTime;
00046     double mEndTime;
00048     out_stream mpFile; 
00050     unsigned mLastPercentage;
00051        
00052 public :
00053 
00061     ProgressReporter(std::string outputDirectory, double startTime, double endTime)
00062         : mStartTime(startTime),
00063           mEndTime(endTime)
00064     {
00065         assert(startTime < endTime);
00066         
00067         // note we make sure we don't delete anything in the output directory
00068         OutputFileHandler handler(outputDirectory, false);
00069         mpFile = handler.OpenOutputFile("progress_status.txt");
00070 
00071         mLastPercentage = UINT_MAX;
00072     }
00073 
00077     ~ProgressReporter()
00078     {
00079         if (mLastPercentage!=100)
00080         {
00081             *mpFile << "100% completed" << std::endl;
00082         }
00083         *mpFile << "..done!" << std::endl;
00084         mpFile->close();
00085     }
00086     
00093     void Update(double currentTime)
00094     {
00095         unsigned percentage = (unsigned)( (currentTime - mStartTime)/(mEndTime - mStartTime)*100 );
00096         if (mLastPercentage==UINT_MAX || percentage > mLastPercentage)
00097         {
00098             *mpFile << percentage << "% completed" << std::endl;
00099             mLastPercentage = percentage;
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00106     void PrintFinalising()
00107     {
00108         *mpFile << "Finalising.." << std::endl;
00109     }
00110 
00114     void PrintInitialising()
00115     {
00116         *mpFile << "Initialising.." << std::endl;
00117     }
00118 
00119 };
00120 
00121 #endif /*PROGRESSREPORTER_HPP_*/
